name: Manhattan Cocktail
description: The classic cocktail, made with rye, sweet vermouth, and bitters.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until outside of shaker is very cold to touch.
Place a maraschino cherry in each of two chilled cocktail glasses. Dividing evenly, strain the contents of the shaker over cherries and serve immediately.
